name: Shake Your Money Simulator 2016
description: "Shake Your Money Simulator 2016" is the newest spend-money simulation which will teach your wallet to hide money from your eyes . Besides , this is a first game in 2016 , where you can finally look at pixel opossum !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio

reviews.review_text: its weird and interesting, but needs way more work.
I'm really confused I dont feel safe in steam anymore

Look people.. I know that when you look at the price of this game and you see money being thrown at a pixelated stripper, you automatically think 'this game is a total joke'.. or perhaps that this game is 'cheap garbage'!  It's actually pretty darn fun! ..until you play two or three 'two-minute' games and your forefinger starts to get sore from clicking your left mouse button a few thousand times, lol.  Watch my Video Review Right here:         YouTube™ Video:  Shake Your Money Simulator 2016 - First Play on Launch Day & REVIEW!
Reminds me of Skyrim with COD elements.  Gameplay With Commentary          YouTube™ Video:

OK... this could had been a global hit, it really could, if only it had been released 35 years ago. I was in my early teens back then, and I can promise you it would have been something... soon after Sinclair, Commodore, Amstrad and many others started releasing their home computers (micro computers they were called back then). By the time those came out, this game would have been obsolete.  I will admit I didn't pay anything for it, got in a giveaway, and still I feel cheated, I mean I would probably refuse to play it even if you paid me an hourly fee.  Still I have to appreciate that this is probably a joke, by someone who wanted to show how you can get anything on steam. If its not a joke... I don't even want to think about it.  Then again... it does have trading cards... that is its one and only asset.
I received this game for free. Honestly I wouldn't spend a single dollar or less for a game like this. It has no story and no gameplay stay away. Free cards and achievements tho.
This game consists of throwing money at a stripper while you dodge random flying objects i would not reccommend this game unless you got it on sale price like i did for 20 cents
This game is a skidmark in my underwear.
